example[0]: The taxi driver gets a rake-off from the hotel.

example[1]: The owners of the pub chain hope to rake off a large cut of the bigger discounts it negotiates with beer suppliers.

example[2]: Corrupt officials may expect a rake-off when expensive goods are imported.
